title: Google\Cloud\DataFusion\V1\Instance
name: Instance
description:
Represents a Data Fusion instance.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datafusion.v1.Instance

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Output only. The name of this instance is in the form of projects/{project}/locations/{location}/instances/{instance}.

params.name: data.description
params.description: A description of this instance.

params.name: data.type
params.description: Required. Instance type.

params.name: data.enable_stackdriver_logging
params.description: Option to enable Stackdriver Logging.

params.name: data.enable_stackdriver_monitoring
params.description: Option to enable Stackdriver Monitoring.

params.name: data.private_instance
params.description: Specifies whether the Data Fusion instance should be private. If set to true, all Data Fusion nodes will have private IP addresses and will not be able to access the public internet.

params.name: data.network_config
params.description: Network configuration options. These are required when a private Data Fusion instance is to be created.

params.name: data.labels
params.description: The resource labels for instance to use to annotate any related underlying resources such as Compute Engine VMs. The character '=' is not allowed to be used within the labels.

params.name: data.options
params.description: Map of additional options used to configure the behavior of Data Fusion instance.

params.name: data.create_time
params.description: Output only. The time the instance was created.

params.name: data.update_time
params.description: Output only. The time the instance was last updated.

params.name: data.state
params.description: Output only. The current state of this Data Fusion instance.

params.name: data.state_message
params.description: Output only. Additional information about the current state of this Data Fusion instance if available.

params.name: data.service_endpoint
params.description: Output only. Endpoint on which the Data Fusion UI is accessible.

params.name: data.zone
params.description: Name of the zone in which the Data Fusion instance will be created. Only DEVELOPER instances use this field.

params.name: data.version
params.description: Current version of the Data Fusion. Only specifiable in Update.

params.name: data.service_account
params.description: Output only. Deprecated. Use tenant_project_id instead to extract the tenant project ID.

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: Display name for an instance.

params.name: data.available_version
params.description: Available versions that the instance can be upgraded to using UpdateInstanceRequest.

params.name: data.api_endpoint
params.description: Output only. Endpoint on which the REST APIs is accessible.

params.name: data.gcs_bucket
params.description: Output only. Cloud Storage bucket generated by Data Fusion in the customer project.

params.name: data.accelerators
params.description: List of accelerators enabled for this CDF instance.

params.name: data.p4_service_account
params.description: Output only. P4 service account for the customer project.

params.name: data.tenant_project_id
params.description: Output only. The name of the tenant project.

params.name: data.dataproc_service_account
params.description: User-managed service account to set on Dataproc when Cloud Data Fusion creates Dataproc to run data processing pipelines. This allows users to have fine-grained access control on Dataproc's accesses to cloud resources.

params.name: data.enable_rbac
params.description: Option to enable granular role-based access control.

params.name: data.crypto_key_config
params.description: The crypto key configuration. This field is used by the Customer-Managed Encryption Keys (CMEK) feature.

params.name: data.disabled_reason
params.description: Output only. If the instance state is DISABLED, the reason for disabling the instance.

methods.name: getDataprocServiceAccount
methods.description:
User-managed service account to set on Dataproc when Cloud Data Fusion creates Dataproc to run data processing pipelines.

This allows users to have fine-grained access control on Dataproc's accesses to cloud resources.

Generated from protobuf field string dataproc_service_account = 25;
